name: Rage On Wheels
description: Rage on Wheels is an immersive metaverse game that has it all: exciting battles, 7 earning rewards, 8 types of utility for the ROW token, stunning animations, unique battle car designs sophisticated economy and more. Lazy NFT minting and an in-built marketplace make it easy for players to create and trade their NFTs, while a crafting system adds an extra layer of depth to the gameplay.
